website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, professional-grade taco holder that stands out for its versatility.
pros: Comes in a 2 or 4-pack with or without handles
holds up to 12 tacos in all
Safe for use in the oven or on the grill
Sturdy, BPA free, and dishwasher safe
Each tray is 4 inches long by 8 inches wide and 2 inches tall
cons: Doesn't easily fit on a standard plate
The edges are a little sharp (but safe)

customer_reviews.title: Taco holders were perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this thing is perfect for parties or even family taco nights. Works well & looks super nice. Used these beautiful things to plate my tacos nicely at home! I'm big on culinary everything!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for building and serving tacos
customer_reviews.text: We have a "taco bar" once a week. With shredded. cheese, onions, cilantro, diced tomatoes and taco sauce as add-ons, building the perfect taco takes time and can be frustrating when trying to hold the taco open and/or keep it from falling over and spilling the contents. These taco stands are like an extra hand that holds your tacos. Now you can focus on building the perfect taco instead of managing the spillage. Plus, they hold them upright on your place while eating. These stands are also dishwasher safe and stack neatly in a cupboard. I highly recommend these to anyone who enjoys tacos and wants to up their game.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kay

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer, if u need them, here they are!
customer_reviews.text: Functionality in its simplest form. Heavy gauge SS, folded to make perfect taco holder. Easy to clean, easy to store (best and stand sideways). I know there are a lot of selections similar to this offering, but I am glad I went with this vendor, product is perfect. Thank you Amazon and this vendor for offering what I could not find locally, and for a price that is more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zicht

customer_reviews.title: I love eating tacos even more now!!
customer_reviews.text: This item make making and eating tacos so easy and keeps the shells from braking. I love that I can heat them up in the oven and they keep the tacos warm! Sturdy and easy to clean, what more could a taco lover want.....more tacos!
customer_reviews.author: Muykido

customer_reviews.title: Taco Holders!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully simple and super sturdy. Definitely going to look great on my next taco Tuesday! These were Amazon Choices when I was hunting for taco holders. 4 for $20? Sure, why not! 2 Day Prime shipping and here they have. Each holder will allow me to pile taco toppings high and heavy. These holders are not artsy or fashionable, but they serve a specific purpose and will look great doing so. They're sturdy and large and I imagine they'll last for the rest of my life (which ideally is another 40 years or about 2000 taco Tuesdays, or 6000 tacos!)
customer_reviews.author: John Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Makes assemby of meal soooo much easier
customer_reviews.text: After years of using the occasional taco dinner as a way to sneak fresh veggies and healthy new ingredients like avocado into our diet, but cursing the assembly line after all the slicing and chopping, voila ! What makes the restaurant service so efficient is now not only for the fixing but attractive and neat for the serving. Clean up minimal. A rinse of hot water a towel and nest the critters back into the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect display for food!
customer_reviews.text: These taco holders are made of a very sturdy lightweight metal and are 8 inches long, about 4 inches wide and 2 inches tall. They do the job and can be used for more than than just tacos!
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain and amazing quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We made tacos and the holders made the meal. They are heavy duty and really pretty. I warmed them in oven for a bit because they retain heat and keep tacos warm. Everyone ate them so fast that I won’t do that again😜I think you should charge more they were much nicer than I dreamed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Wood

customer_reviews.title: here, hold my taco
customer_reviews.text: Taco Tuesday hasn't been the same with these bad boys. Makes piling in fillings and toppings easy on our standard sized taco shells. Looks great on the table, with a clean and sleek design, and are super sturdy. Taco holders are one of those things that you never knew you really needed until you actually use them and see how much easier they make your life, trust me on this, you need it!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Taco Holders & A Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just received these last week and used them for the first time last night. They are durable, strong and hold the tacos perfectly. Easy to clean and the best part- they are stackable which makes for low-profile storage. Only complaint would be one or two of them seem uneven and wobble just a tad (not enough to make a real difference or warrant a return) but other than that- perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DavyDoesCA

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Taco Stand!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! No idea why I didn’t order these earlier. They arrived quick. They are dishwasher safe. They are very well made and the recipe card a nice touch. FYI, they don’t come with the tray in the picture or the Tacos. Really people? You are buying 4 taco stands. They work great and make our margarita and tacos taste even better!! We used them to load the tacos and serve. If you need a way to keep all the Ingredients inside the taco shell, make a burrito. 😜 I highly recommend this sellers taco stands!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: perfectly functional
customer_reviews.text: i had lunch at a restaurant last week and these were the holders that held my fish tacos. while there i popped on Amazon, searched and these looked just like the ones at the restaurant so boom! i clicked add to cart and purchased them right on the spot :) they will be used a lot in our home ... especially great for my elderly mom to keep all the taco contents in their shell :)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Holds up tacos for filling.
customer_reviews.text: We should have bought a set of these years ago. Sure makes Taco Tuesday a lot easier to prepare. This style has handles on each end so you can pick up the whole rack of tacos when filled. Very sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CRANERUN

customer_reviews.title: Love my taco stands
customer_reviews.text: I’ve eaten tacos all my life and never thought about using a stand. My husband has been asking for them for years, so I finally ordered them. I wish I had had them years ago! They make eating tacos so much easier, especially soft tacos, and are so easy to clean. Fit in the dishwasher and come out perfect. I would highly recommend them. The only negative was that they were made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Keener

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy this earlier?
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t I buy this earlier? We have use the heck out of these little containers for holding tacos. Normally we have tacos about once a week so I don’t know what I did without these things! Glad I have them thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: J. wedrick

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed these many times. I like to flame grill my flour shells and then mold them down into the holder. My guests love the way they hold and then can fill with them still in the holder as they eat. Wonderful and would recommend buy them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: MASmith

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of burning my hands from warming my tortillas and trying to hold them while I make my tacos. These are perfect. One of those gadgets I never knew I needed until I used it. These are sturdy, easy to clean and make taco building easy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: so  helpful
customer_reviews.text: hold my tacos up right easy to use. I split them up and gave a friend two she loves them. I had bi use for four. They clean up well .I don't have a dishwasher but I wash in soapy water and the're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline howell

customer_reviews.title: Margarita time
customer_reviews.text: Used them the first day. I’m a person that loves taco and have them all the time. I’m not sure why I never bought these before but make it so easy to make my taco. I will need to buy some more when we have company over so they can enjoy the easy of holding and making taccos
customer_reviews.author: Rvaughan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Taco Holders!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to purchase taco holders for a long time but didn't want plastic. These holders are made of stainless steel and are sturdy enough to hold any size taco and they fit very well on my dinner plates. They really make it easy to fill your tacos and carry them to the dinner table or the patio. Wish I had found them years ago. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality - not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for taco holders for some time- these are perfect. Good quality, dishwasher safe, and just the right size. You can do regular or street tacos, no problem. Lots of taco nights in our future!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Nowell

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money and I love tacos. These make it so easy to either make the tacos and show them off with great presentation or it makes it easy for people to get the toppings on themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent racks and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. We are using it for tacos and hot dogs. It came with free recipe ideas. This holder is high quality stainless steal and cleans well. The seller sent it promptly as promised. Very happy with my purchase and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The perfect add on to taco night! Finally we can fill and eat our tacos with ease and without mess. They fit in the dishwasher perfectly. Good sturdy metal. I’d definitely buy more if I needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They’re sturdy. But I kind of wish I would’ve gotten plastic so that I could throw the tacos in the microwave to heat them up a little bit after they were in the holders
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: These holders were fantastic. Having 2 boys it made the taco assembly so much easier. They could make 3 tacos at a time. Great quality. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: elpidio cruz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent material
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for any size hard or soft tacos. I use extra large hard taco shells and standard soft corn tortillas and it perfect for both. Very sturdy stainless steel that is easy to clean by hand or in dishwasher. I much recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: toriamarie

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Dishwasher safe. Debated between the stainless and the plastic. Went with stainless and I’m glad I did. These will be used for decades to come. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these handy taco holders. The best part is that they came with recipes for all kinds of tacos!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Gatti

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as I read
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the size, the ad didn't read clearly. This small device great for Street Taco, not a standard 6" taco shell.
customer_reviews.author: OKCFDfyrfytr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived extremely quickly and a great product! I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Hailee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for taco lovers!
customer_reviews.text: These holders work perfect! Used them with some parchment paper to make cheese shells and it was a breeze with them! Great price for a set of 4!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tacos
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Personal Chef and these were perfect for my lobster Tacos! Follow me on Instagram @Desidatenights
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. The stainless steel used is very sturdy. Can be used on the grill or in the smoker and oven. No rough edges. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: RaineDear

customer_reviews.title: The perfect taco holder!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to order some of these for a long time, and finally did. These were perfect for what I was looking for. Very well made and very sturdy. You can hold either 3 tacos or flip them over and hold 2. Our family loves tacos and these will get their use!!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: I love, love, LOVE them.
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how heavy the package was. Great price. Excellent quality. Gotta get a set for camper! These are awsome and helpful stuffing the taco.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina W

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I love these taco holders. They're super simple and easy to use and clean. They work great for holding soft shell tacos upright so the contents don't fall out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: these are a great idea
customer_reviews.text: these are study, stainless steel, easy to clean. holds taco shells so you can fill several at once and not worry about them tipping over and spilling out while you eat one. I actually bought 2 sets. My son asked for it for a gift, when we got them we liked them so much we had tacos the next night to try them out. Had to purchase the 2nd set for my son as we used the one we purchased for him.
customer_reviews.author: C. Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Improved Taco Tuesday!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't rocket science. It's taco art. Taco Tuesday just went up a notch at our house. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I can eat tacos in PEACE without mess! I hated when my tacos would fall over and all the contents would come out. A GODLY INVENTION!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Late in the Christmas shopping season and my wife and I couldn’t find taco holders at HomeGoods. I found these on Amazon and they were delivered before Christmas. We gave my son two and we kept the other two.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: They clearly extradited the service line at our party's Taco bar. Everyone that saw them commented on how convenient they are. Easy to clean also.

customer_reviews.title: Tacos
customer_reviews.text: Been doing a lot of tacos at home. These taco holders are fantastic for presentation. Quality product, shipped promptly.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them yet but I can already tell they are strong and will easily hold soft or hard tacos and fit on a standard plate.
customer_reviews.author: pccoder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect taco
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I make my tacos and put them in the trays and they are perfect and ready to eat when they get to the table.
customer_reviews.author: cmickeygo

customer_reviews.title: Great taco Tuesday addition
customer_reviews.text: Restaurant quality taco stands. Perfect for Taco Tuesday! Extremely well made and a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: TheDTM

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love the taco holders! They’re steel & not aluminum and will last us for years
customer_reviews.author: gsmiller50

customer_reviews.title: Taco bomb baby!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, useful,easy. We will have regular taco night because now the process has become much easier. One minor thing, wish it came with a narrow/thing brush, the grease in the crevice was a small challenge to clean. Otherwise, taco bomb baby!
customer_reviews.author: Rob.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty taco stand
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for fish tacos. They’re heavy duty and would hold up to any taco you want to make.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used these yet but they are just like the ones my fave taco place uses. I’m sure they will work well.
customer_reviews.author: lynn m

customer_reviews.title: Great Taco Holders!
customer_reviews.text: These taco holders are really great quality! Use either for 2 tacos or 3 depending on which side up you use.
customer_reviews.author: krista cain

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Taco stand  at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, stackable, sturdy, holds 3 Tacos fully loaded, and polished. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for every kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: After years of making tacos without holders, I can’t believe we waited so long to buy these. Handsome, well made and easy to clean! A great product for the price and will last for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Luebbers

customer_reviews.title: these are perfect
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these! Lets them prep and eat 3 tacos for one sitting. I love to pan fry corn tortillas and these work great for corn or flout tortillas. We use them for Gyros and chicken pitas as well. Dishwasher safe and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Michemory

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget to have
customer_reviews.text: I really like these little stands. They fit very well and make it easy to fill the taco shells.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Holders
customer_reviews.text: I got these to help make cheese taco shells and they worked perfectly!! Great heavy duty quality! I would purchase again for a gift or if I needed more for a party!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Quint

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way they are made, easy to use and clean up is a snap, excellent product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: christine coderre

customer_reviews.title: Serve like a restaurant right at home!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new taco holders! It's easier to fill the tacos - place tortilla in slot and fill! One side serves two, flip over and the other side serves 3 tacos. And it presents so well - we used to serve tacos that fell over, or the filling fell out and we love these that serve tacos that hold up right through pick up! We'd recommend these to any family!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria D

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a taco party. They worked perfectly and allowed people to fill their tacos without them tipping over. They are very easy to clean and I am looking forward to using them a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smeby

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thick gauge metal
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made and packaged. Thicker and sturdier than I expected -- a pleasant surprise. I'm glad I chose the model with handles, I feel it's worth the relatively small price difference for that extra convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Delmont

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE Definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these little bad boys! OMG I had no idea these even existed. Quality is amazing! Very high end look and feel. It was so fun stacking up our street tacos & layering everything just right! Cleaning them was a breeze! I ordered the 4 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: High quality! These have a nice weight, look great, and are easy to wash. Better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Flute

customer_reviews.title: Taco Night Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how I’ve gone this long without buying these!! Such a game changer. These are restaurant grade taco holders, 10/10 I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Halie Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and great price for the quantity
customer_reviews.text: Great taco holder. Stainless steel, with handles, good quantity. I received one tray that was rusted but the rest were fine, nice design, haven’t used them yet in the oven but they look promising.
customer_reviews.author: Geo Lifestyle

customer_reviews.title: They work like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Holds the taco shells perfectly, which makes them so easy to fill with anything you are using. Clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: AKBY

customer_reviews.title: Step up your taco game!
customer_reviews.text: Oh yea... We just stepped up our taco game! It is truly the little things that make cooking at home such a pleasure, and with these holders, we don't have to worry about messy plates, broken shells, and taco fumbles. They are easy to clean and nice and sturdy. I'll have to order more to start having dinner parties.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua I MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & well made
customer_reviews.text: Our friends love Mexican food & were delighted with this gift. They use it every week.

customer_reviews.title: My tacos stay put!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My tacos don’t fall apart and stay put. Looks like a restaurant served them!

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of manufacturer was very good, no burrs or sharp edges to rework. Not effected by heat so keeping the tacos hot in the oven works great.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: So surprise it is super heavy but it works and super great.

customer_reviews.title: Love these taco holders!

We have seen these taco holders at a restaurant we go to quite frequently but it never occurred to me that we could buy these tacos holders. My kids told me they had bought some. I love them! Great quality and very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love love them. Wanted this for a long time. Thank thank thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Makes Taco Night Fun!

Arriving just in time for taco night, we used both hard shells and soft and it worked well for both! Easy to clean and easy to store makes this even more lovable!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for holding up my tacos!

customer_reviews.text: I should have bought these years ago. They work great!

This is the best way to serve tacos. These holders are sturdy and sleek, and they stack nicely so I will be able to store them in a small space.

customer_reviews.text: Set of four, and each will hold 4 tacos. As described. Sturdy and well made. My husband is a metal man and he said he couldn't have done any better.

customer_reviews.text: The taco holders are sturdy and you can place them in the oven to warm before making your tacos. We also use them to hold our hot dog buns while "dressing" the hot dogs

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly for my tacos. Very easy to clean, and sturdy.

product_meta.title: Taco Holder - Taco Holders Stainless Steel - Taco Trays - Taco Stand Up Holder - Taco Stand - Taco Plates (HOLDS 3 Tacos - 4 Pack)
feature_bullets: ✅ TACO HOLDER RESTAURANT GRADE 4 PACK- Durable, oven, grill and dishwasher safe, this taco rack will be in use for years in your kitchen. The solid stainless steel tray design is ideal for serving your tacos warm.

✅ TACO STAND shell holder with larger serving trays - tortilla warmer to accommodate authentic tortilla style or shell style tacos, measures 8 x 4 x 2 inches, easily surpassing the smaller width and height of the wire taco plates.

✅ STAINLESS STEEL TACO HOLDERS - Holds the largest tacos, soft shell or hard shell, up right for a great presentation every time whether using using fish, beef, pork, chicken or vegetarian, keeping your meal where you want it, with this professional presentation. We recommend heating soft tortillas on the stove before filling with your favorite ingredients.

✅ TACO SHELL HOLDERS - Preparation was just made so much easier with these metal taco holders. Simply insert tacos and spoon in the ingredients into multiple tacos at once. Less than half the prep time involved with dishing these up, you'll eat healthy tacos more often. Use for Taco Tuesday, Mexican fiesta, Cinco De Mayo parties.

✅ TACO HOLDER 100 PERCENT MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. If you are not happy with your taco stand up holders simply return it for a 100% money back guarantee within 30 days of purchase, no questions asked, but were convinced you'll be using them!
